name: Hot Shots Golf: Open Tee
description:
Hot Shots Golf: Open Tee®
Cure your golf itch anytime, anywhere! Your favorite golf game just got more addicting with new modes, tons of collectable items and more customizable outfits than you can shake a stick at. And forget foresomes - connect wirelessly with your buddies and start an eightsome!
WHENEVER YOU'RE READY... we're waiting with an OPEN TEE.
Download the full game today!
Hot Shots Golf: Open Tee is a registered trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Inc. © 2005 Sony Computer Entertainment Inc.
Note: Requires Memory Stick Duo™
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PLAYSTATION®Network Terms of Service and this item’s use restrictions. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
